title: NEW CHAMPIONS - Banned from ranked? [POLL]
body:
I see Riot have changed new champion release prices to 7800 IP instead of the standard 6800. Whilst this is a small deterrent it also just pushes people to buy new release champions with RP so it's pretty disappointing on Riots behalf. Instead of increasing the price to 7800 IP for a week perhaps Riot should disable the new release champions from ranked for a week. People who are thirsty enough to play the new champion will take it straight to normal giving them  a lot more practice before ranked. This would in fact I believe decrease the amount of trolls with newly released champions. 

http://imgur.com/GB6v7ui

This was a game from this morning a day after the champions release. I know all new Taliyah players won't do this but I feel like whenever new champions are picked that team is at a disadvantage.

replies.body:
Champs are always 7800 for their release week.
It will go down to 6800 next week, just wait or play like four games?

Edit: i'm an idiot and didn't read the entire post.

An I don't even play ranked.
You just got a bad player, taliyahs play style isn't that hard to grasp, I played her in ranked and did exceptionally well
Well, she thankfully wasn't on my team, but perhaps you're just a really good player. The average player won't do well with an unknown champion in their hands.
And if the average player wants to throw their elo away, then it's their choice.
